TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现一个标记扩展，该标记扩展支持从 XAML 中进行的动态资源引用。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that supports dynamic resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用可能会在运行时更改的内容时，需要动态资源引用。Dynamic resource references are necessary when referencing content that might change at run-time. 内容更改的原因可能是应用程序启动的，也可能是外部的。The reasons for the content change might be application-initiated or might be external. 例如，如果您要包括的样式依赖于报告用户配置的首选项的系统资源，例如主题、字体设置等。One example is if you are including styles that rely on system resources that report user-configured preferences, such as themes, font settings and so on. 此类是一个标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. WPF 中的标记扩展类主要用于为 WPF XAML 处理器实现的某个方面提供基础结构支持，而标记扩展类公开的成员通常不是直接从用户代码中调用的。Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the WPF XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by the markup extension classes are not typically called from directly user code. 此类特别支持 XAML 中的 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension) 用法。This class particularly supports the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension) usage from XAML. 有关动态资源引用的详细信息，请参阅 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension)。For more information about dynamic resource references, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 XAML 信息，请参阅 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension)。For XAML information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 此标记扩展所引用资源的键。

span.span: The key of the resource that this markup extension references.

summary.span: 用提供的初始键初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the provided initial key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 XAML 处理器在处理 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension)的特性语法时使用。This constructor is used by XAML processors when processing the attribute syntax for the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.

summary.span: 返回一个应在应用了此扩展的属性上设置的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 对于 ，这是当前父级链的资源字典中的对象，该对象的键由 指定。

span.span: For , this is the object found in a resource dictionary in the current parent chain that is keyed by the .

returns.span: 要在应用了扩展的属性上设置的对象。

span.span: The object to set on the property where the extension is applied.

returns.span: 这是一个将在稍后计算的表达式，而不是实际值。

span.span: Rather than the actual value, this will be an expression that will be evaluated at a later time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 WPF XAML 处理器实现，不应直接调用。This method supports WPF XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法在对象创建过程中正确处理 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension) 值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension) values during object creation. 要由所提供的值设置的属性的类型必须为 。The property to be set by the provided value must be of type . 此实现不依赖于所传递的任何服务 `serviceProvider` 。This implementation does not rely on any services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.

exception.span: 尝试为未提供 的扩展提供值。

span.span: Attempted to provide a value for an extension that did not provide a .

summary.span: 获取或设置此动态资源引用指定的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the key specified by this dynamic resource reference.

summary.span: 该键用于通过中间表达式在资源字典中查找资源。

span.span: The key is used to lookup a resource in resource dictionaries, by means of an intermediate expression.

value.span: 此动态资源引用指定的资源键。

span.span: The resource key that this dynamic resource reference specifies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键的类型不是强类型，但通常以字符串、 或派生类的形式提供 。The key is not strongly typed, but is usually provided as either a string, a , or a derived class. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 XAML 信息，请参阅 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension)。For XAML information, see [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension).
